Text.Page:
Mansur is rebuilding many of the houses the storm destroyed, but as you can see, trees don't grow so well out here.

He needs some help collecting usable lumber from the damaged buildings."I can do that."

You can find a lot of unused timber and scrap around the abandoned house near the Frost Wastes. It should still be solid if you just knock off the ice.

I hope there's enough for Mansur to finish his workâ€”we'd all like our lives back to normal.

You have my lumber?

Bah! The ice goes all the way through. We'll be lucky if half of it holds together. Just like every other bit of wood in this place.

Well, waste not, want not. Lucky I'm the best carpenter in Westonia.
